TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed MemoryMappedFileOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Provides memory allocation options for memory-mapped files.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions DelayAllocatePages = int32(67108864)

Docs.summary: Memory allocation is delayed until a view is created with either the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateViewAccessor%2A> or <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateViewStream%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No memory allocation options are applied.
